section.content: There are several categories of Character functions.

section.title: Case Functions
section.discussion: Functions to test and manipulate the case of characters.

section.title: Comparison Functions
section.discussion: Functions to compare whole or partial strings.

section.title: Counting Functions
section.discussion: Functions to count elements in strings.

section.title: Extraction Functions
section.discussion: Functions to count elements in strings.

section.title: HTML Functions
section.discussion: String functions relating to html output.

section.title: Search Functions
section.discussion: Search for elements in a string.
